location.name: Room1
location.description: You're in the strange unpleasant place: dirty brick walls and two old wooden doors.

action.name: Take the key
action.description: You see a key on a floor.
action.hidden_description: You can't see properly here - it's too dark.

location.name: Room2
location.description: It's a small room with a carpet on a wall, chest and table.

action.name: Inspect the chest
action.text_response: You have unlocked this chest with your key. Here you have found another key.
action.hidden_text_response: It's locked. This big bronze chest is unbreakable with your hands.

action.name: Inspect the table
action.description: You see a table with something on top of it.

location.name: Room3
location.description: This place looks like prison - steel door with bars and darkness at the other side.

action.name: Open the door
action.text_response: Now you can go to the other side. Good luck!

action.name: Take the lamp
action.description: You see a lamp attached to the wall.
